title: `oauth_client` provider schema
description: The `oauth_client` root schema comprises the entire provider databag for this interface.

issuer_url.title: Issuer URL
issuer_url.description: The OpenID Connect identity provider's issuer URL.

authorization_endpoint.title: Authorization Endpoint
authorization_endpoint.description: The OpenID Connect identity provider's authorization endpoint URL.

token_endpoint.title: Token Endpoint
token_endpoint.description: The OpenID Connect identity provider's token endpoint URL.

introspection_endpoint.title: Introspection Endpoint
introspection_endpoint.description: The OpenID Connect identity provider's introspection endpoint URL.

userinfo_endpoint.title: Userinfo Endpoint
userinfo_endpoint.description: The OpenID Connect identity provider's Userinfo Userinfo URL.

jwks_endpoint.title: JWKS Endpoint
jwks_endpoint.description: The OpenID Connect identity provider's jwks endpoint URL.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: A space-separated list with the OpenID Connect identity provider's supported scopes.

client_secret_id.title: Juju secret ID
client_secret_id.description: The juju secret ID that holds the client_secret.

groups.title: Groups Claim Name
groups.description: The name of the claim that represents the user's groups

ca_chain.title: Certificate Authority Chain
ca_chain.description: The CA chain, must be present only if it is needed for the requirer to trust the provider's TLS certificate
